title: The Ghastling: Book Eleven
description: The Ghastlingâ€™s eleventh issue, released during the COVID-19 lockdown in April 2020, features eight tales designed to transport readers to other nightmarish places and imagined horrors.Includes stories from Timothy Granville, Carrie Hardman, Tim Jeffreys, Christopher Long, Drew Nicks, Hailey Piper, Steven Sheil and Mat Troy.
author: Rebecca Parfitt
